<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Curare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1999)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Incapacitation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=93" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 68 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Hunters all over Golarion favor curare, a potent paralytic derived from boiled tree bark.

 **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds (but see stage 3); **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, enfeebled 2, and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (1 minute); **Stage 3** 4d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, enfeebled 2, and slowed 1 (1 round). If the victim fails the saving throw while at Stage 3, the poison ends and the victim is [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) for 2d6 minutes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
